医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
医用大麻可能有助于减少渴望并改善恢复结果UBC Okanagan和Thompson Rivers University的一项新试点研究研究了医学监督的大麻在住宅恢复之家中的使用方式可能会支持人们接受药物使用挑战的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/medical-cannabis-may-help-reduce-cravings-cravings-and-improve-recovery-uncovery-ustcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/medical-cannabis-may-help-reduce-cravings-cravings-and-cravings-and-improve-recovery-uncovery-ustcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b57d485b-8e48-4971-8b17-636ee3f9f9f85a Fri, 04 Apr 2025 23:52:15 -0400 Medical cannabis may help reduce cravings and improve recovery outcomes
研究：农村癌症患者越过专门护理的州线在一项由联邦资助的研究中，犹他大学亨斯曼癌症研究所的研究人员（U）发现，有7％的Medicare患者越过癌症护理的国家边界，而住在农村地区的患者的比率几乎是两倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/study-rural-cancer-patients-patients-cross-state-lines-for-for-pecialized-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/study-rural-cancer-patients-patients-cross-state-lines-for-for-pecialized-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=762171da-eca0-430d-96b8-935a673c4e31 Fri, 04 Apr 2025 23:12:30 -0400 Study: Rural cancer patients cross state lines for specialized care
用基于豆类的口香糖来打击流感和疱疹的新方法在当今的相互联系的世界中，传染病构成了不断升级的威胁，如冠状病毒大流行和H1N1，SARS，SARS，Ebola，ebola，Zika和H5N1（鸟流感）病毒的爆发所证明的那样，所有这些病毒都具有重大的全球健康和经济影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/new-apphach-to-combat-combat-influenza-and-herpes-with----------------------------------------------------------- gum.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/new-apphach-combact-combat-combat-influenza-and-herpes-with------------------------------------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08AD303C-E334-407B-A14E-CF8310DCDEE0 Fri, 04 Apr 2025 23:07:36 -0400 New approach to combat influenza and herpes with bean-based gum
研究揭示了黑人服务医院的护理差距一项刚刚在护理研究中发表的新研究发现了有关患者结局的差异，特别是与护理护理有关的差异，主要是为黑人社区服务的医院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/study-reveals-nursing-care-gaps-gaps-inblack-inblack-serving-serving-hospitals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/study-reveals-nursing-care-gaps-gaps-nursing-gaps-in-black-serving-serving-hospitals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f72d846f-9c3b-49f5-b3EA-1850429fb325 Fri, 04 Apr 2025 23:02:05 -0400 Study reveals nursing care gaps in Black-serving hospitals
冷冻EM揭示了人类染色质重塑剂的精细结构细节染色质重塑在基因调节中起着至关重要的作用，影响了DNA的访问方式。此过程中的破坏也可能导致癌症和其他疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/cryo-em-reveals-fine-structural-structural-details-of-human-chromatin-remodeler-remodeler-in-action.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/cryo-em-em-reveals-fine-structural-structural-details-of-human-chromatin-cromatin-remodeler-in-action.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7826a9d0-40fd-4bf1-b9e7-575ec6a3333c1c Fri, 04 Apr 2025 22:56:20 -0400 Cryo-EM reveals fine structural details of human chromatin remodeler in action
两种基于植物的饮食，与类似的生存益处和低环境影响有关根据欧洲心脏病学会（ESC）的科学大会ESC Harciology 2025（ESC）的研究，两种基于植物性的饮食与类似的生存益处和低环境影响有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/two-plant-lind-diets-diets-linked-to-similar-survival-benefits-and-benefits-and-low-envormental-impact.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/two-plant-linds-diets-linked-to-similar-survival-benefits-and-survival-benefits-and-low-envormental-impact.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bad75dda-66bc-4e9a-a469-1177773d43ccf Fri, 04 Apr 2025 13:45:00 -0400 Two plant-based diets linked to similar survival benefits and low environmental impact
对细菌防御机制的新见解可以帮助打击抗生素耐药性抗生素耐药性是一项全球健康挑战，可以在几十年内超过癌症死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/new-insights-into-bacterial-defense-mechanisms-could-help-help-combat-combat-combat-antibotibiotic-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/new-insights-into-bacterial-bacterial-defense-mechanisms-could-help-help-combat-combat-combat-combat-antibiotic- reasistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb82fb8b-d385-4214-4214-8109-da3c8c8cc4929d Fri, 04 Apr 2025 13:36:00 -0400 New insights into bacterial defense mechanisms could help combat antibiotic resistance
新型NK细胞疗法在淋巴瘤患者中显示出强烈的反应根据德克萨斯州癌症中心的一项新研究，使用AFM13预先复杂化的一种新型细胞疗法，使用AFM13预先复杂化的CD30/CD16A双特异性抗体，是一种安全且产生了强烈的反应率，对于难治性CD30阳性淋巴瘤患者而言，这是安全的，并且产生了强大的反应率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/novel-nk-cell-therapy-shows-shows-strong-respons-in-response-in-lymphoma-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/novel-nk-cell-ther-therapy-shows-shows-strong-responge-in-response-in-lymphoma-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53EE8A2B-E67C-468C-BEBF-C780B4504A94 Fri, 04 Apr 2025 13:28:00 -0400 Novel NK cell therapy shows strong response in lymphoma patients
瑞典开创性的国家倡议旨在将研究与医疗保健联系起来一项开创性的国家倡议，精确的OMICS倡议瑞典（Promise）旨在将研究与医疗保健联系起来，并将瑞典建立为数据驱动的精确医学领域的世界领导者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/groundbreaking-national-intiathiative-intiative-in-sweden-aims-to-connect-research-research-with-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/groundbreaking-national-intiathiative-intiative-in-sweden-sweden-aims-to-connect-to-connect-research-with-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c5fe02b-fb41-4b79-a91c-6b47dfd5e4e3 Fri, 04 Apr 2025 13:20:00 -0400 Groundbreaking national initiative in Sweden aims to connect research with healthcare
新加坡推出了一个战略新标准，以加强消毒剂市场随着公众对卫生和感染控制的认识在后流行世界中的增长，新加坡已经启动了战略性的国家标准，以加强迅速扩展的消毒剂市场的公共卫生和行业问责制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/singapore-launches-a-strategic-new--strategic-new-stand-to-strengthenten-disenfectant-market.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/singapore-launches-a-strategic-new-strategic-new-sandard-to-strange--stentharden-disenfectant-market.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2805C736-98E0-41D4-8007-15CB367CF92E Fri, 04 Apr 2025 13:12:00 -0400 Singapore launches a strategic new standard to strengthen disinfectant market
